Brookings Report: Big Data Is Key To Improving Writing Skills

Big data is an important tool to aid in improving writing skills. Here's how it can help, and what to know about improving your capabilities.

Sean Mallon March 18, 2019 March 18, 2019
29 Shares 2,241 Views
  • Share on Facebook
  • Tweet on Twitter
  • +
Shutterstock Licensed Photo - By Rawpixel.com

Big data is typically associated with the professions that became popular during the 21st Century digital boom. However, big data advances have also played a role in shaping many other skill sets. Writing is one of the competencies that is affected by big data. A 2013 report from Brookings showed this.

Big Data is Playing a Vital

Brookings published a report in 2013 on the role of big data in evaluating and improving student writing skills. Here is an excerpt:

“Data analytics offer helpful means of ranking students and assessing classrooms as a whole. Automated tools can provide dashboards for teachers and real-time feedback and evaluation for students. There remain a number of challenges in big data applications, but there are promising tools available for classroom usage.”

The third point on the challenges of big data in the classroom is an important one. However, Darrell West and Joshua Bleiberg clearly showed that is important.

Beyond Evaluations: Using Big Data for Improving Writing Skills

Using big data to evaluate writing skills is one thing. Using data analytics to improve them is another. But experts are making progress.

Outlining the Challenges

Academic writing is a fact of life in the educational career of students. The skills in writing are vital across all disciplines from history, language to biochemistry to showcase one’s knowledge on their course. Numerous students easily master the knowledge and information in their curriculum. However, when it comes to writing, things get more complicated. While some students may consider writing straightforward and natural to them, others find it overwhelming. The big question on their minds is what to write about. However, determining how to write an academic essay or custom essay is something one can learn.

Mastering the guiding principles in writing is paramount to success. Writing an academic essay requires you to provide a substantial and arguable thesis statement, with conclusive evidence to support it gathered from other resources and through your research. With hard work and a desire to improve your writing skills, you can produce excellent papers. However, these two are not enough.

Big data can play an important role. A number of new tools are helping less proficient writers perfect their craft with advances in big data and AI. The following guidelines help writers create perfect compositions even when on a tight deadline. Big data can make things easier for them.

Create an outline

Before beginning to write your essay, you should have a rough idea of about what you will be writing. An outline is a skeleton which enumerates the essential parts of the composition, which guides and enables you to write well. How to write an essay outline? Begin with an introduction, which should comprise of a thesis statement, a body which outlines three or more solid points that support your thesis, and a conclusion, which brings your discussion to an end.

READ
Is Predictive Analytics Changing The Future Of Mobile Phone Monitoring?

Big data makes it easier for writers to come up with a great outline. A number of new deep learning tools study the most popular white papers and articles and give writers guidance on their formatting and outlines.

Broaden your skills in grammar, style, and punctuation.

To ensure your writing is understood and considered real, you have to have excellent comprehension and understanding of punctuation and grammar. When it comes to grammar, you have to be able to make use of verbs and subject agreements well, use proper noun and pronouns, as well as, use proper sentence structure. When it comes to using punctuation, you have to have an understanding of how to use different punctuation marks such as commas and full stop among others. Ensure you mix it up by including different punctuation marks such as the colon, the semi-colon, and dash.

Also, the style of writing is paramount. Ensure you always utilize active voice as opposed to passive voice. For instance, instead of saying “The mother’s house was cleaned by her daughter,” in a passive voice, you can say, “The daughter cleaned her mother’s house.” You strengthen your essay by following this advice. Most importantly, avoid utilizing unnecessary words that make your composition too long and complicated as they distract from your argument. So, it’s recommended to improve learning skills to get an excellent mark or get a high degree passing exams, credit or etc.

These are all a lot of things to keep track of. The good news is that AI driven tools like Grammarly make things easier. They use deep learning to continually improve themselves and even adapt to changes in the language as it evolves.

Have a mastery of vocabulary

In academic writing, determining how to write a good essay depends on how you use your language. You should note that scholarly compositions seek to convince your reader that you can make intelligent arguments. You might think that knowing and using big words will make you sound smart. However, in most cases they make you appear like you are compensating for poor writing skills. Do not feel like you have to utilize big words. Instead, use simple vocabulary that makes your essay clear on its message instead of showing off big words, which you might misinterpret, their meaning or change your argument.

READ
Your Guide To Different Telematics Solutions And The Data They Collect

Big data makes it easy to find the right words. There are a lot of dictionary tools that use Hadoop algorithms to find the right words for certain contexts.

Comprehend the argument of your essay and evaluate the supporting evidence.

The way that you articulate your main argument is essential in any academic essay, so ensure it is clear in your mind first. Resist the temptation to go off your topic  as you expand your research. Make sure you do not fall in this trap as it interrupts your writing making your essay complicated. An excellent argumentative essay format requires you to evaluate all the evidence you come across before including it in your composition. Always do this to ensure it supports your central point of discussion to produce a robust research paper.

You can use big data tools to help you track the consistency of your argument over time.

Compose a proper conclusion that supports your research.

A conclusion is one of the most integral parts of an essay though often overlooked. It ties your research together by maintaining consistent support for your thesis.  A well-crafted conclusion should comprise of an opening sentence about your research, followed by the thesis statement re-written in different words. Next, is a quick rundown of the significant points and evidence presented in support or disapproval of your argument with a closing statement that leaves a lasting impression on the reader about your research.

Academic writing may be an unavoidable educational endeavor for students throughout their learning career; however, it always poses challenges. Practice and more practice make your skills in composition perfect. Keep at it and ensure you have an outline for your essay; you hone your punctuation, grammar and style skills and develop your vocabulary. Also, understand your argument, analyze your evidence and compose a conclusion that connects the whole essay, ensuring it is perfect. By observing these guidelines, you will succeed in learning how to write better essays.

Big Data is the Key to Improving Your Writing Skills

Using big data can significantly improve your skills as a writer. However, it is still important to make sure that you have the fundamentals down. Big data and AI tools can do a lot of things, but they can’t write your articles for you!
